comment: I was disappointed to find that there were no options to change colors on primary or ambient mode. Other than that, it's a beautiful design.

title: Only one color!

author: Christopher Mortlock
comment: Like it (one of the best out there thus far), just wish there was an option to change colors. Would really love to see this in red and green. 4 stars till then.
title: Not bad, but...

comment: Love the look, would love to see more "glow" effect
title: Good

comment: Im weak when  it comes to the color blue..looks Amazing cheers.
title: Love it

author: Darren Neilan
comment: Love the look, would go five stars if weather was accurate. Fixed or automatic, weather is not correct. Standard apps on my phone and watch show correct weather, so don't know where this app gets its weather info from.

author: Joshua Akonom
comment: Back to great, thanks for the quick update :-)  Made me realize how bad i missed it even if it was for just a couple days lol!!

author: Feng Kan
comment: Nice watch face, I would have expected a little customization for a paying app. If the watch is not link with phone, the weather would drop out. The hue of the watch face should adjustable. For LG G round or watches with OLED capability, the dimmed face is not that great. It is just the normal watch with dimmed down look. Because of the blue, the dimm mode does not pop out as the default faces do.
title: Good watch face, could improve.

author: Humayon Ahmad
comment: If you're looking for a digital feel then this is brilliant - looks good on the watch - so far have bought 2 faces are both from the same developer!!  One negative is it would have been nice to have a different feel on ambient mode!
title: LG watch R

author: Kelly G
comment: Really busy, cluttered, looking digital watch face, I love it. It's exactly the look want when selecting a digital face.
title: Great watch face!

comment: Awesome face but useless because it causes the watch to freeze withen a few hours, emailed the creator with no responce.. using g watch r
